blogPost.title: What are some strategies to master difficult emotions like fear, anger, etc? Answer by @MattBodnar, Partner at Fresh Capital Group. https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/1yHtP8dxW6
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 掌握恐惧、愤怒等困难情绪的策略有哪些？回答者：@MattBodnar，Fresh Capital Group合伙人 https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/1yHtP8dxW6。
掌握恐懼、憤怒等困難情緒的策略有哪些？回答者：@MattBodnar，Fresh Capital Group合夥人 https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/1yHtP8dxW6。
恐怖や怒りなどの難しい感情を使いこなすための戦略はありますか？回答者：@MattBodnar（Fresh Capital Groupのパートナー） https://t.co/bbcwgqeqTm https://t.co/1yHtP8dxW6

previous.title: What are some thought exercises that can help people understand the value of their time? Answer by @RomiNeustadt, Entrepreneur, Author, Speaker and Biz Coach. https://t.co/UaLgbSPT6S https://t.co/TFvR6J0aeJ

localize.full_text: 有哪些思维训练可以帮助人们理解时间的价值？回答者：@RomiNeustadt，企业家、作家、演讲者和商务教练。https://t.co/UaLgbSPT6S https://t.co/TFvR6J0aeJ。
有哪些思維訓練可以幫助人們理解時間的價值？回答者：@RomiNeustadt，企業家、作家、演講者和商務教練。https://t.co/UaLgbSPT6S https://t.co/TFvR6J0aeJ。
人が自分の時間の価値を理解するのに役立つ思考訓練は何かありますか？Answer by @RomiNeustadt, Entrepreneur, Author, Speaker and Biz Coach. https://t.co/UaLgbSPT6S https://t.co/TFvR6J0aeJ

next.title: What are some simple tips that can make people more effective at public speaking? Answer by Jason Patel, Founder of @Transizion_. https://t.co/GrZwt086Pb https://t.co/XsFQXCYz8g

localize.full_text: 有哪些简单的技巧可以让人们更有效地进行公众演讲？由@Transizion_创始人Jason Patel回答。https://t.co/GrZwt086Pb https://t.co/XsFQXCYz8g。
有哪些簡單的技巧可以讓人們更有效地進行公衆演講？由@Transizion_創始人Jason Patel回答。https://t.co/GrZwt086Pb https://t.co/XsFQXCYz8g。
人前で話すときに効果的な人を作る簡単なコツとは？Answer by Jason Patel, Founder of @Transizion_. https://t.co/GrZwt086Pb https://t.co/XsFQXCYz8g
